title: Raving waving
creator_credit: Grasshopper Group and Stuart Wynn Jones
brief_description: An experiment in animation technique produced by a group of amateur filmmakers. Abstract wave movements are animated in time with rhythmic “musique concrete”, the sound track of which was edited note by note on tape.
description: An experiment in animation technique produced by a group of amateur filmmakers. Abstract wave movements are animated in time with rhythmic “musique concrete”, the sound track of which was edited note by note on tape.
